item.description:
We haven't had dim sum in a while. Is anyone else craving some?

After going to Hei La Moon several times, let's give a new place a try. This time we'll be at Chau Chow, which has locations in Chinatown and Dorchester. There is parking, but if you take the T it's about a mile from Fields Corner on the Red line.

Afterwards we can walk it off at one of the nearby parks (some on Boston Harbor) or throw some strikes at Boston Bowl!

Please RSVP for everyone who will need seats.
item.name: Get Some Dim Sum
